Corpus_Christi.KMJR: KMJR (98.3 FM) is a radio station broadcasting a Regional Mexican format. Licensed to Odem, Texas, United States, the station serves the Corpus Christi area. The station is owned by Tejas Broadcasting Ltd., LLP. Its studios are located in the Six Points district south of downtown Corpus Christi and the transmitter is in the city's west side.
